Text: FW summer volumes zone firmJohn Please find below our demand for AprilOctober I would actually entertain the idea of a month type baseload deal here Please let me know what you have available Thanks BV Original Message From Bray Hayden Sent Thursday November PM To Vanderhorst Barry Subject summer volumes zone firm Barry Here are the volumes you needed April May June July Aug Sept Oct

TCO delivered supplies offer requiredHeres what were looking for on TCO Delivery points should be primary delivery but we need the right to move to secondary points to keep up with retail demand Market Area Volumedaydth Term If you have portions available of the above I will consider smaller packages as well The Columbia systems are planning to operate their systems much as theyve done last year which could cause havoc during colder weather We are planning to be on the overprotective side of the equation on some days this may imply that we sell back to you some packages if we are unable to find a home for it ourselves Barend VanderHorst EBa

FWEES is no longer authorized to serve customers at NYSEG Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday December PM To Vanderhorst Barry Subject From Donna C Vandenberg Manager Gas Supply Control Barry the attached is per our conversation See attached file Enron Dec doc
